title: Kubernetes: 48% of Users Struggle With Tool Choice
author: Lawrence E Hecht
description: Platform engineering appears to ease some of the pain points associated with using Kubernetes in production, says a new survey by Spectro Cloud.
cntitle: Kubernetes：48% 的用户在工具选择上遇到困难
cndescription: Spectro Cloud 的一项新调查显示，平台工程似乎缓解了在生产中使用 Kubernetes 遇到的一些痛点。
